A.definition: having both masculine and feminine characteristics

G.definition: an herb or other vegetable drug, distinguished from a mineral or chemical drug

K.definition: a british slang for exhausted or very tired

M.definition: speech or writing designed to obscure, mislead, or impress

N.definition: an occurence of only superficial interest or content; a dull or insigificant occasion

O.definition: the branch of onithology that studies birds' eggs

P.definition: a wide-ranging and impressive array or display

Q.definition: a person who is 40 years old or whose age falls between 40 and 50

S.definition: ridges of snow formed on a snowfield by the action of the wind

T.definition: a worker of wonders or miracles

U.definition: to remove a bar or bars from

V.definition: containing different versions of the text by various editors

W.definition: to separate or distinguish valuable from worthless parts

X.definition: an attraction to foreign people, culture or custom

Y.definition: a circular tent consisting of a framework of poles covered with felt or skins used by mongolian and turkic nomads of east and central asia

Z.definition: a place in california within the boundaries of the Mojave National Preserve
